thread.section_title: Premier Inn London City (Aldgate) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect choice
thread.title_full: Perfect choice - Review of Premier Inn London City (Aldgate) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: sal b
title: Perfect choice
text: 3 night stay .. Great location and used nearby buses to access our chosen museums and an evening theatre trip . Friendly staff, clean comfortable room, took advantage of the evening meal offer on first night and very acceptable so repeated a second time. Staff friendly and keen to please . Would definitely stay here again and recommend.
